heading: this time, vonnegut
subheading: rice university had lined up the rumpled novelist before last year's email hoax, which had vonnegut giving frilly advice to mit graduates.
author: wired news report
text: that wasn't kurt the private university in houston, texas, lined up vonnegut last year, before a piece of email made its way around the net "i think it was a darling column she wrote, but i would never do that to mit," the 75-year-old vonnegut told the associated press. "i certainly intend to be a hell of a lot more serious with rice."
